abstract: New York Judge Susan Phillips Read announces plans to step down from Court of Appeals in August, 16 months earlier than expected; move leaves Judge Eugene F Pigott Jr as sole Republican on court, and gives Gov Andrew E Cuomo another opportunity to shape it through appointment.
lead_paragraph: Judge Susan Phillips Read said she would leave the bench in August to spend more time with her family.

headline.main: Resignation Leaves a Sole Republican Judge on New York State’s Highest Court
headline.print_headline: Resignation Leaves a Sole Republican on Top State Court

snippet: Judge Susan Phillips Read said she would leave the bench in August to spend more time with her family.
